doc:
Ross Martin https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ross_Martin 0 Ross Martin (born Martin Rosenblatt, March 22, 1920 – July 3, 1981) was an American radio, voice, stage, film and television actor. Martin was known for portraying Artemus Gordon on the CBS Western series The Wild Wild West, which aired from 1965 to 1969. He was the voice of Doctor Paul Williams in 1972's Sealab 2020, additional characters in 1973's Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kids, and additional character voices in 1978's Jana of the Jungle. Ross_Martin ( born Martin_Rosenblatt , March_22_,_1920 – July_3 , 1981 ) was an_American_radio , voice_,_stage_,_film_and_television_actor . Martin was_known for portraying Artemus_Gordon on the_CBS_Western_series The_Wild_Wild_West , which aired from 1965 to 1969 . He was the_voice of Doctor_Paul_Williams in 1972 's_Sealab_2020 , additional_characters in 1973 's_Butch_Cassidy and the_Sundance_Kids , and additional_character_voices in 1978 's_Jana of the_Jungle .
